level.text: Receive and administer grants, as necessary, to provide services to assist individuals with disabilities in achieving or maintaining gainful employment; and
Enter into contracts or other agreements, as necessary, to provide services or support to assist individuals with disabilities in achieving or maintaining gainful employment.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 5002 of Fiscal Year 2008 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2007 (D.C. Act 17-74, July 25, 2007, 54 DCR 7549).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-20, see notes following ยง 32-242.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title: Section 5001 of D.C. Law 17-20 provided that subtitle A of title V of the act may be cited as the "Rehabilitation Services Program Amendment Act of 2007".
